title: Posts Room
description:
This is an enormous room, in the center of which are four wooden
posts delineating a rectangular area, above which is what appears to
be a wooden roof.  In fact, all objects in this room appear to be
abnormally large. To the east is a passageway.  There is a large
chasm on the west and the northwest.

northwest.failureMessage: You can't go northwest from here.

west.failureMessage: You can't go west from here.

down.failureMessage: You can't go down from here.

atmosphere: The air is cool and damp.
Water drips somewhere in the darkness.
Your footsteps echo off the stone walls.
